short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auxtool is an extension to provide accessibility testing for websites available on internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auxtool is an extension to provide accessibility testing for websites available on internet. Accessibility features help differently abled people to accesss those websites which are not generally accessible to them.
